params.name: emailAddress
params.doc: Email address the unsubscribe link is for.

docs.summary:
Creates an unsubscribe link to be shared with the relevant recipient.

 If someone clicks the **Unsubscribe** button on the confirmation page,
 the recipient's `subscriptionStatus` is changed to `UNSUBSCRIBED`.

permissions.name: Manage Email Subscriptions
permissions.description: Request permission to read and modify the subscription status for email addresses.

params.name: subscription
params.doc: Email subscription to update or create.

docs.summary:
Updates or creates an email subscription for the requested email.

 An email subscription is always returned in the response,
 regardless of whether it was updated or created.

examples.title: Update or Create an Email Subscription

docs.summary: Triggered when an email subscription's status is changed.

permissions.name: Read Contacts
permissions.description: Request permission to read the site's contact info.

permissions.name: Manage Email Subscriptions
permissions.description: Request permission to read and modify the subscription status for email addresses.

members.name: email
members.doc: Email address.

members.name: subscriptionStatus
members.doc:
Indicates the recipient's opt-in or opt-out status
 for marketing emails.

 - `NOT_SET`: No status specified.
 - `PENDING`: Subscription confirmation was requested,
    but recipient hasn't confirmed yet.
 - `SUBSCRIBED`: Recipient has opted in to marketing emails.
 - `UNSUBSCRIBED`: Recipient has opted out of marketing emails.

 Defaults to `NOT_SET`.

members.name: deliverabilityStatus
members.doc:
Indicates last reported status of sent emails.

 - `NOT_SET`: No status specified.
 - `VALID`: Emails haven't bounced,
    but the recipient hasn't actively subscribed or unsubscribed.
 - `BOUNCED`: The last email to the recipient bounced or was rejected.
 - `SPAM_COMPLAINT`: Recipient registered a spam complaint
    with their email provider.
 - `INACTIVE`: No activity has been reported.

 Defaults to `NOT_SET`.

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load

members.name: offset
members.doc: number of items to skip in the current sort order

members.name: count
members.doc: The number of items returned in this response

members.name: offset
members.doc: The offset which was requested

members.name: total
members.doc: The total number of items that match the query

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: A flag that indicates the server failed to calculate 'total' field

members.name: filter
members.doc:
Filter options.
 Currently, querying is supported on the `email` field
 with the `$in` array filter.

members.name: paging
members.doc:
Pagination options. For more information, see
 [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: subscriptions
members.doc: List of subscribed emails that matched the query options.

members.name: metadata
members.doc: Metadata for the paginated results.

members.name: subscription
members.doc: Email subscription to update or create.

members.name: subscription
members.doc: Updated or created email subscription.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_emailsubscriptions_v1_BulkUpsertEmailSubscriptionResult

members.doc: Position of the requested email subscription in the bulk array.

members.name: emailSubscription
members.doc: New or updated email subscription.

members.name: error
members.doc:
Error information if the action failed.
 Omitted from successful actions.

members.name: emailAddress
members.doc: Email address the unsubscribe link is for.

members.name: link
members.doc: The unsubscribe link.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • NOT_SET - No Subscription exists
  • PENDING - Pending Subscription
  • SUBSCRIBED - Subscribed
  • UNSUBSCRIBED - UnSubscribed

Possible values are:
  • NOT_SET
  • VALID - valid/deferral
  • BOUNCED - bounced/rejected/invalid
  • SPAM_COMPLAINT - spam/complaint
  • INACTIVE - valid, but no activity reported
